verses.verse: Yahweh <WH3068> is my shepherd: <WH7462> I shall lack nothing. <WH2637>
He makes me lie down <WH7257> in green <WH1877> pastures. <WH4999> He leads <WH5095> me beside still <WH4496> waters. <WH4325>
He restores <WH7725> my soul. <WH5315> He guides <WH5148> me in the paths <WH4570> of righteousness <WH6664> for his name <WH8034>'s sake.

Even though I walk <WH3212> through the valley <WH1516> of the shadow of death, <WH6757> I will fear <WH3372> no evil, <WH7451> for you are with me. <WH7626> Your rod and your staff, <WH4938> they comfort me. <WH5162>
You prepare <WH6186> a table <WH7979> before <WH6440> me in the presence of my enemies. <WH6887> You anoint <WH1878> my head <WH7218> with oil. <WH8081> My cup <WH3563> runs over. <WH7310>

Surely goodness <WH2896> and loving kindness <WH2617> shall follow <WH7291> me all the days <WH3117> of my life, <WH2416> and I will dwell <WH3427> in Yahweh <WH3068>'s house <WH1004> forever. <WH753>
